snippet.title: Wii Longplay [018] Punch-Out!!
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by:  Tsunao

Next Level Games-developed game. They say it is a boxing game, but I disagree. I find it more of a puzzle game with boxing elements.

Little Mac is back and he fights many opponents to become the top boxer in the WVBA (World Video Boxing Association). Doc Louis helps as well. Other than that, THERE'S NO FRIGGIN' PLOT!!

It may look like I am good, but trust me: I am NOT! I just spammed the hell out of "Restart" to get a round that is decent. Everyone is floored on Round 1 with Special KO animation (getting a KO or TKO with a Star Punch). This goes through Contender mode (normal mode) and Title Defense mode (hard mode) as well as a fight against the secret opponent (f'yeah!!). Don't mind ANY inconsistencies (time for beating secret opponent.) and record at the end! The idea of the retiring came late, so I thought it would generate a few laughs to do it that way. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
